divs: Sighting DetailsAwoke at 3:10 AM to go to the bathroom and get a drink of water. Heard a loudhumming - like a fan on its highest speed. Saw a bright white light outside andwent out to look. Saw a triangular pattern of lights (7?) apparently on theunderside of something large moving acroos the sky. Lights went out, flickeredgreen, then flashed on green. Then went off for 2 seconds, then flickered red,then went on red. I went in the house to wake my wife but she only heard thehumm - it had cleared the treeline by then. Later in the morning (aroundnoontime) I observed a single black helicopter cruising around, then two moreflying in formation. Dont know if its related or not
trends: There has been one other sighting in Goffstown
There were no other sightings in Goffstown on or around July 27th 2002
